channel.title: [Need help] How do i stop npcs from walking around?
channel.description: Im VERY new to private servers so i basically have no idea what im doing so could someone show me how to stop the npcs free walking around home on team viewer, im using zenith 728 source and client. If you can help add my skype cody.middleton14 Thanks

item.title: [Need help] How do i stop npcs from walking around?

item.title: [Need help] How do i stop npcs from walking around?
item.dc:creator: @Rskit-kat Rskit-kat
item.description:
@Rskit-kat wrote:

TeeBark:

Being very new, I wouldn’t suggest to start with 667 RSPS’. Perhaps try coding something lower whilst learning Java first.

I agree, you should probably start with a 317. Anyways…

Go to src>com>rs> and find NPCSpawning.java

In it, there should be codes that look like (I made up random numbers)

Basically, you change both the ‘true’ to ‘false’ for the NPC you don’t want to walk around. That should solve your problem

Read full topic
